[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [TextCanvas](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.md) &gt; [createTextBufferObject](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.createtextbufferobject.md)

## TextCanvas.createTextBufferObject() method

Creates a new \[\[TextBufferObject\]\]. The computed text vertex buffer is equivalent to the result of performing the `addText` function for the input text in the screen origin.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createTextBufferObject(text: string | GlyphData[], params?: TextBufferCreationParameters): TextBufferObject | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string \| [GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Input text. Provide an array of \[\[GlyphData\]\] for better performance. |
|  params | [TextBufferCreationParameters](./harp-text-canvas.textbuffercreationparameters.md) | Optional creation parameters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TextBufferObject](./harp-text-canvas.textbufferobject.md) \| undefined

New \[\[TextBufferObject\]\] (or `undefined` if requested text glyphs couldn't be retrieved from the current \[\[FontCatalog\]\]).
